dependencies: python 2.7, ELK, Cisco Spark, Apache WSGI
description:
Bot to provide support for the ServiceDesj in front of the end user.

Main idea is to provide the references documents of the cutsomer via a chatbot (Cisco Spark).
The search engine can be on internet, Hub, CSV (cmd to load new file).
Behind of this search, BigData is used to collect and optimize Q&A model.

Additionnaly if no success with the bot and the search engine, the bot connect the SD team with the people.
